thread.title: Toffoli scores late in 2nd as Kings beat Avalanche 2-1
thread.title_full: Toffoli scores late in 2nd as Kings beat Avalanche 2-1

title: Toffoli scores late in 2nd as Kings beat Avalanche 2-1
text:
Toffoli scores on breakaway late in 2nd period to lead Kings in 2-1 win over Avalanche THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   19, 2015 - 12:51 amLast Updated: October 19, 2015 - 12:51 am   
Men's sports (2326) 

LOS ANGELES â€” Tyler Toffoli scored a breakaway goal late in the second period, and the Los Angeles Kings beat the Colorado Avalanche 2-1 on Sunday night. 
Marian Gaborik also scored, Jonathan Quick made 21 saves, and the Kings beat the Avalanche for the sixth straight time and improved to 8-0-1 in their last nine meetings. 
Just 23 seconds after Matt Duchene tied the score at 1-1 on the Avs' potent power play, Toffoli intercepted Erik Johnson's pass and raced down the ice to beat Reto Berra over his glove hand and regain the lead. 
Berra, coming off a shutout at Anaheim on Friday night, finished with 38 saves.
